achievements.title: First Chapter
achievements.desc: Some stories need more progress. Yours is one of those.

achievements.title: Searcher
achievements.desc: Everyone has a role. Which is yours?

achievements.title: The Realization
achievements.desc: What matters is in the heart. You feel like you can start to see everyone's intentions just by looking at them.

achievements.title: New Self
achievements.desc: You have acquired the storytelling and character development required to move your world forward.
